SEARCH
Package librarySE.core

Enum Class MaterialType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<MaterialType>
librarySE.core.MaterialType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<MaterialType>, Constable
public enum MaterialType extends Enum<MaterialType>
Enumeration representing the various material types available in the library.

Each MaterialType corresponds to a specific category of library item (e.g., book, CD, journal) and defines how its fines are calculated by delegating to a matching FineStrategy implementation.

Design Pattern Integration:

  • Strategy Pattern: Each type returns its own fine calculation strategy.
  • Factory Method: Uses FineStrategyFactory to instantiate the correct FineStrategy for the material type.

Example Usage:


 MaterialType type = MaterialType.CD;
 FineStrategy fine = type.createFineStrategy();
 int fineAmount = fine.calculateFine(3); // e.g. 3 days overdue Ã— 20 NIS/day = 60 NIS
Author:
Eman

  • Enum Constant Details

    • BOOK

      public static final MaterialType BOOK
      Represents a standard printed book material.

      Default fine rate: 10 NIS/day, Borrow period: 28 days.

    • CD

      public static final MaterialType CD
      Represents an audio CD material.

      Default fine rate: 20 NIS/day, Borrow period: 7 days.

    • JOURNAL

      public static final MaterialType JOURNAL
      Represents a journal or periodical material.

      Default fine rate: 15 NIS/day, Borrow period: 21 days.
